column1: Little Goat Diner////We enjoyed a great
column2: leisurely Sunday afternoon brunch here today.  Loved the decor
column4: food was uniformly delicious and so generously portioned that 3 of us took half home for lunch!  All 4 of us enjoyed our meals - goat burger
column6: BBQ pork sandwich and fat club. We somehow managed to eat dessert too. The choco taco sundae daughter ordered was an interesting combination of sour cream icecream
column7: hard shell chocolate and chocolate covered "taco shells". We also enjoyed the chocolate turtle tart with cashews and the pumpkin tart with pecans.
